TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. But to have our ship shipped to you, cost extra shipping because it has to be carried on a ship shipping ships shipping ships.

I wish for bacon.

Edited September 26, 2014 by TheTsar52

Granted. You choke on the package, which looks/tastes/smells exactly like the bacon in every way except it's made of plastic.

I wish I was warned before every bad thing happened to me.

:33 < Did someone say shipping??

Granted. You get week old bacon nast.

I wish for an airplane.

Granted. It's shielded (accursed) with an entity called "turbulence". You fly away without the airplane and go splat.

I wish I owned all the turbulence in the world.

Granted. That will cost you the US debt limit.

I wish I had a M1A2 Abrams.

Granted. It's in 1:1000 scale.

I wish for a to-scale shuttle Discovery.

granted. before you can use it the death star fires

I wish for toa of hpe and hype marines

Ok. When they are both released it turns out they suck.

I wish for pics/videos of destructible buildings.

Granted, but they ain't what you thing they are.

http://imgur.com/a/TQQFf#0

I wish for a mountain of SCIENCE!

Edited September 28, 2014 by TheTsar52

Granted, you get superheated Science Isotopes?

I wish for a four-kilogram perfect sapphire crystal for, um, optical reasons.

Granted. It grew into an ugly, but it's still a perfect sapphire crystal.

I wish that my sapphire crystals would grow into uglies.

Granted. They grow into uglies which then disappear since they're so ugly.

I wish that I could fly

granted, but yo forget how to while over a volcano crater.

I wqish that spore 2 would come out and be better thatn spore

Granted. EA doesn't know what better is and sues Shores of Hazeron, then copies it and made it into a terrible game.

I wish that everything first tenses.

Granted, but everything then second relaxes.

I wish for a decent gaming computer.

Granted, but it cannot connect to the internet and has no USB ports.

I wish that my browser wasn't lagging.

Granted, your browser is not lagging.... It crashed and will not load up anymore... ever!!!!!

I wish one of my books gets published.

Edited September 28, 2014 by Lhathron the Elf

One of your books gets published as YELLING ALL CAPS TEXT in 72 point comic sans on a skeevy .net website with a black background and popup ads every 30 seconds. With no credit given to you, of course.

I wish for a 10-watt green laser with a perfectly-round, zero-divergence beam, an unlimited power source, and robust components that will never wear out, even with continuous use.

Edited September 29, 2014 by GreeningGalaxy

Granted. Your perfectly coherent 10W green laser with unlimited power source masses 500,000 tons and can only be aimed by rotating the Earth.

I wish for cheap, high quality foldable displays for mobile devices.

Granted. The technology becomes prohibitively expensive for anything larger or more complicated than a small black-and-white watch face.

I wish for a computer that can really handle KSP.

Granted. You now own a quantum supercomputer with a liquid-helium-immersed core and a small power plant's worth of power draw. The power company cuts you off and fines you for the transformers you blew out.

I wish for a gallon jug of pineapple juice.

Granted. Your mouth starts bleeding, it's a gallon jug of pineapple!

I wish for pineapples to be filled entirely with deadly spikes instead of yellowish goodness.

Granted. You also receive retrograde amnesia.

I wish for a personal power source for that quantum supercomputer.

Granted. The personal power source is a pedal powered magneto that delivers one minute of computing for every hour of strenuous pedaling.

I wish for an infinitely long and never unentertaining sci-fi book series.

Granted. Star trek novels. If your opinion of the definition of 'entertaining' includes 'really bad fanfiction,' you're in luck.

I wish for a chocolate peanut butter cream pie.
